import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { EcommServiceService } from '../ecomm-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-display-pdt', templateUrl: './display-pdt.component.html', styleUrls: ['./display-pdt.component.css'] }) export class DisplayPdtComponent { img_link:string[]=[]; constructor(private my_service:EcommServiceService){ this.img_link = my_service.temperoary; } ngOnInit() { console.log(this.img_link); } onGetProductDummy(my_product:string){ this.my_service.onGetProductDummy(my_product); console.log("Product is clicked"); } }
